review: -Tries out the escape mode and think to myself: this should be easy-Starts out as a strong prisoner-Starts destroying shower heads in bathrooms to get points-Guard sees me and i punch him but it only left him injured-The same guard search my cell and he was still injured-I skip my punishment as fast as i can so i could beat the guard and leave him unconscious-I grab the guard keys and baton and upgrade the strong and skilled figther to max-Armed guard comes in and i disarm him, grab his shotgun and make my way out-Almost there so close to freedom-A random guard comes outside with a tazer and tazes me near the map border...♥♥♥♥
